version_description:
- Chart offsets are now recalibrated. Please reset your current offset setting with the new Calibration mode.
- Pause hint animation updated
- Home-bar in iPhone X (or above) now requires double swipes to trigger
- Gameplay UI updated
- Minor bugs resolved

v1.2 Update includes:
1. A total of 10 NEW tracks! New Chapter "III Gemini" and 3 Free tracks
(Arch / ARForest / Aurelius Y. / Cosmograph / ikaruga_nex / MonstDeath / Neutral Moon / Qayo / SDMNE / t+pazolite / 影虎。 / テヅカ)
2. New Cloud Save system
3. New Info Pop-up
4. Bonus Fuel for Nova & SuperNova
5. An upgraded Performance mode
6. UI updates & Bug fixes
7. Improved Game Performance (Gameplay etc.)

New Difficulty: OVERNIGHT
- 10 charts added (Default tracks & Stage 1 tracks)

New Mission System - "Chapter Booster" & "Station"
- Bonus Fuels, OVERNIGHT Missions & more rewards!

"Chart Statistics" is now displayed
- Check the "Density" & "Distribution" of each chart!

UI changes & Misc
- Active Chapter & Fuel Boost ON/OFF can now be changed in "Music"
- New Loading animation.
- Fuel cap is now extended from 10,000 to 20,000.
- Changed Chapter 1/2 unlock requirements.

1. Fixed bug: In some occasions, song reward was not delivered when S-SNS-1 was accomplished. Both S-SNS-1 & MW-1-4 has been reset and can now be re-done.
2. Fixed bug: In some devices, touch input around upper and bottom border line could causes false input events.
3. Minor bugs fixed.

Q. Chip Chapter "Asteroids" Launches!
- 3 new songs:
【Strangers on Earth】by Iris
【Galaxia】by TQ
【Cross†Ray】by HyuN feat. 月下Lia
...and more coming!

3 New "OVERNIGHT" charts added
【NIGHT KEEPER】by Cosmograph
【Chartreuse Green】by t+pazolite
【終焉から命を救う】by MIssionary

Free Q. Chip & Bonus Fuel Boosts!

UI changes & Misc
- Added on/off switch for slide input
- New mission sorting feature.
- Bug fixes

- Main Chapter "IV Cancer"
7 new songs by 3R2/Frums/LeaF & sak/Nego_tiator/PSYQUO vs. PTB10/Silaver/影虎。
​
- 2 New Free Default Songs
“Step to Sky” by EmoCosine
“Take Me Far Away (Game Edit)” by Reku Mochizuki
​
- 2 New Songs in Chapter "Asteroids"
“Neurotoxin” by 削除
“L2 -Reminiscence-“ by Ice
​
- Minor UI updates

1. 打擊音效實裝！
- 打擊音效可於「樂曲/遊玩設定」更換
- 打擊音效的音量可於「設定」調整
注意：遊玩前請先調整判定偏移

2. 免費主線章節「Milky Way」關卡7登場！
- ARESI by Jehezukiel vs Yukino
- Intruder by Riya

3. 「OVERNIGHT」譜面追加
- BPM=RT by t+pazolite
- Valkyrie's Wing by HyuN
- Spellbound by James Landino

4. 其他
- 新APP圖案登場！
- Bug修正等

每月更新中！
本月更新內容：

1. 全新「稱號」系統登場
達成各式各樣的成就任務，過百個稱號碎片免費送大家！
獲得的稱號碎片還可於個人資料頁面組成只屬於自己的DIY稱號喔！

2. 「Station」大型改版
新增超過10種類以上的成就任務！除了稱號碎片以外還有各種各樣的獎勵...
當然不會少了新曲，對吧！
＊成就類型任務會隨新遊戲物品今後陸續更新

3. 新增「Station」免費解禁曲
- Garden of Eden Feat.AKA by XinG
- Terror Screamer by seatrus
- Oracle by TQ

4. 新增「Asteroids」樂曲
- My Story! (feat. 柚子花) by KOTONOHOUSE

5. 新增「OVERNIGHT」譜面
- Amphetamine (RAVON Edit.) by MonstDeath vs Neutral Moon
- Prestige and Vestige by ikaruga_nex & 影虎。
